name: Kelrot:Inside the Arcade
description:
-------CONTROLS-------

WASD, Arrow Keys: Move
Space: Jump
Left Mouse Click: Shoot

Your goal is to find all the cubes hidden in the end of each level.You can access levels by going through portals in the main hub.You can  shoot only if you have ammo you need to get the blue ammo powerup.

This game is made by me and my friend Tarık.

Coding And Game Design: Mert POLAT
Main Theme Music and Art: Tarık Emre Gökırmak.

Tarık's Instagram: h ttps://www.instagram.com/trgkrmk/
